mapper.insert: insert into board_table(m_id, b_title, b_contents, b_date,b_filename, cate_number) values(#{m_id},#{b_title},#{b_contents},now(),#{b_filename},#{cate_number})
mapper.select: select * from board_table order by b_number desc limit #{pagingStart}, 3
select * from board_table order by b_number desc limit #{start}, #{limit}
mapper.update: update board_table set b_hits = (b_hits+1) where b_number=#{b_number}
mapper.select: select count(b_number) from board_table where cate_number = #{cate_number}
